<a id="BoneConstraint3D"></a>

# BoneConstraint3D

**Inherits:** [SkeletonModifier3D](SkeletonModifier3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [AimModifier3D](AimModifier3D.md), [ConvertTransformModifier3D](ConvertTransformModifier3D.md), [CopyTransformModifier3D](CopyTransformModifier3D.md)

A node that may modify Skeleton3D's bone with associating the two bones.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base class of [SkeletonModifier3D](SkeletonModifier3D.md) that modifies the bone set in [set_apply_bone()](BoneConstraint3D.md#BoneConstraint3D_method_set_apply_bone) based on the transform of the bone retrieved by [get_reference_bone()](BoneConstraint3D.md#BoneConstraint3D_method_get_reference_bone).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<a id="BoneConstraint3D_method_get_reference_bone"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_reference_bone**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#BoneConstraint3D_method_get_reference_bone)

Returns the reference bone of the setting at `index`.

This bone will be only referenced and not modified by this modifier.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

This bone will be only referenced and not modified by this modifier.
